description: Enumeration of data types the describe the contents of objects like Tables and Files.
name: DataType

enum.name: SENSITIVE_DATA
enum.description: The default type assigned to all Tables and Files.  Sensitive_data indicates that the contents 'might' contain Protected Health Data (PHI), data with access restriction, data with special terms-of-use, or data that should not be released to the public.

enum.name: OPEN_DATA
enum.description: Open_data is data that is safe to release to the public.  Open_data must not include Protected Health Data (PHI), data with access restrictions, or any type of terms-of-use.
